name: Samosa
description: A popular Indian snack with a crispy outer layer and a delicious filling of spiced potatoes and peas.

name: Vada Pav
description: A popular street food in Mumbai, consisting of a spicy potato dumpling sandwiched between a pav (bread) along with chutneys.

name: Masala Chai
description: A flavorful and aromatic Indian spiced tea made with a blend of tea leaves, spices, and milk.

name: Hot Coffee
description: A classic cup of hot brewed coffee, perfect to kickstart your day or provide a mid-day energy boost.

name: Cold Coffee
description: A refreshing chilled coffee drink, ideal for cooling down on a hot day or as a delightful dessert.

name: Dabeli
description: A popular street food from the Kutch region of Gujarat, Dabeli is a spicy and tangy snack with a filling of mashed potatoes.

name: Chips
description: Crispy and savory chips, a perfect accompaniment for your snack time or as a side dish.

name: Ice Candy
description: Colorful and fruity ice candy, a delightful frozen treat to beat the heat.

name: Rice Bowl
description: Steamed Rice loaded with boiled veggies and spieces.
